reviewText: Good value! This was perfect for one of my sons Christmas presents.
So glad I found this combo because I had just scored Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2 and Smurfs 2 in the discount bin at major box store! I love, love Hotel Transylvania.

Hotel Transylvania is one of my children's favorite movies at ages 2.5 and 5 years old. My husband and I also enjoy watching this repeatedly, lots of funnies and not scary for my 2.5 year old! Cloudy w/a Chance of Meatballs is another the kids like. We haven't watched The Smurfs yet but it's a great price for 3 movies!
Great trio for the price and hilarious movies, I highly recommend this as a gift for any children's collection.
